page.title: 05MILLER'S FARM,ANWICK FEN
page.content: We visited{Mr.Miller's Farm.} He has 135 acres of land which he works with his son. His crops are wheat, sugar beet and potatoes. He has {Medium {Black Fen Land }which covers an area between the main {A153 road} and the southern edge of our survey area. Mr. Miller told us he gets 16 tonnes per acre of potatoes. He gets 19 tonnes per acre of sugar beet and 2 1/2 tonnes of wheat. His bread wheat is { {Avalon} and his feed wheat is {Norman variety. His average yield of sugar beet is 210 tonnes, with 200 tonnes of potatoes and 250 tonnes of wheat. His family has farmed there for 100 years. Mr.Miller has 4 tractors, a combine harvester, beet machine,potato setter and picker, rotavator, drill, plough and trailers.
